      • ScoreboardBar

        public ScoreboardBar(java.lang.String barname,
                     java.lang.String teamNamePrefix,
                     int displaySlot)
        Construct new ScoreboardBar
        Parameters:
        barname - - The name of this ScoreboardBar
        teamNamePrefix - - The prefix of the Scoreboard team packets
        displaySlot - - The slot of this ScoreboardBar (0: list, 1: sidebar, 2: below name)

        Returns:

        Returns:
